title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.3 - Controlled system
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 100.3 - Controlled system

State Regulations

That part of the Thruway system extending from, and
including, the toll barrier at Woodbury to, and including, the toll barrier at

Williamsville, and that portion of the Thruway system identified as the

Berkshire section from its intersection with the main line between Coxsackie
and Selkirk to, and including, the toll barrier at Canaan, and that portion of
the Thruway system extending from, and including, the toll barrier at

Lackawanna, to, and including, the toll barrier at Ripley. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
100.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
